original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2701)@  在武將四周，召喚出8隻<color=#4cc769>無當飛軍</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>無當飛軍</color>屬性  <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1266)@  武力值：$Soldier_Str(1266)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2701)@ Around the generals, 8 <color=#4cc769>Undang Flying Army</color> were summoned to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769>Wang Feijun</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color>$Soldier_HP(1266)@ Force Value:  $Soldier_Str(1266)@
